classData.comment:
/**
 * @class Neo.component.Toast
 * @extends Neo.component.Base
 *
 * @example
        Neo.toast({
            // mandatory
            appName         : this.component.appName,
            msg             : 'Alarm was set to 11:30 for journey into Neo development',
            // optional                        defaults
            closable        : true,         // false
            iconCls         : 'fa fa-bell', // null
            maxWidth        : 300,          // 250
            position        : 'br',         // 'tr'
            slideDirection  : 'right',      // 'right'
            title           : 'Alarm Clock' // null
        })
 */
classData.name: Toast

classData.comment:
/**
     * Used by the ToastManager
     * @member {Boolean} running=false
     * @private
     */
classData.description: Used by the ToastManager
classData.name: running

classData.comment:
/**
     * Timeout in ms after which the toast is removed
     * @member {Number} timeout=3000
     */
classData.description: Timeout in ms after which the toast is removed
classData.name: timeout

classData.comment:
/**
         * Valid values for positions
         * @member {String[]} positions = ['tl', 'tc', 'tr', 'bl', 'bc', 'br']
         * @protected
         * @static
         */
classData.description: Valid values for positions
classData.name: positions

classData.comment:
/**
         * True automatically applies the core/Observable.mjs mixin
         * @member {String[]} slideDirections = ['down', 'up', 'left', 'right']
         * @static
         */
classData.description: True automatically applies the core/Observable.mjs mixin
classData.name: slideDirections

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.component.Toast'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} ntype='toast'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: ntype

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String[]} baseCls=['neo-toast']
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: baseCls

classData.comment:
/**
         * If true makes the toast sticky and show a close icon
         * @member {Boolean} closable=false
         */
classData.description: If true makes the toast sticky and show a close icon
classData.name: closable

classData.comment:
/**
         * If set, it shows this icon in front of the text
         * e.g. 'fa fa-cog'
         * @member {String|null} iconCls=null
         */
classData.description:
If set, it shows this icon in front of the text
e.g. 'fa fa-cog'
classData.name: iconCls

classData.comment:
/**
         * Limits the width of the Toast
         * @member {Number} maxWidth=250
         */
classData.description: Limits the width of the Toast
classData.name: maxWidth

classData.comment:
/**
         * Sets the minimum height of the Toast
         * @member {Number} minHeight=50
         */
classData.description: Sets the minimum height of the Toast
classData.name: minHeight

classData.comment:
/**
         * Your message. You can also pass in an iconCls
         * @member {String|null} msg_=null
         */
classData.description: Your message. You can also pass in an iconCls
classData.name: msg_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Describes the position of the toast, e.g. bl=bottom-left
         * This creates a cls `noe-toast-position`
         * @member {'tl'|'tc'|'tr'|'bl'|'bc'|'br'} position='tr'
         */
classData.description:
Describes the position of the toast, e.g. bl=bottom-left
This creates a cls `noe-toast-position`
classData.name: position

classData.comment:
/**
         * Describes which direction from which side the toasts slides-in
         * This creates a cls `neo-toast-slide-${direction}-in`
         * @member {'down'|'up'|'left'|'right'} slideDirection_='right'
         */
classData.description:
Describes which direction from which side the toasts slides-in
This creates a cls `neo-toast-slide-${direction}-in`
classData.name: slideDirection_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Adds a title to the toast
         * @member {Number} title_=null
         */
classData.description: Adds a title to the toast
classData.name: title_
title
construct

/**
     * Using the afterSetMsg to trigger the setup of the dom

     * @param {String|null} oldValue
     */

Using the afterSetMsg to trigger the setup of the dom
A new container is added as an item.
We cannot use the vdom here.
